actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1308.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #564 (337-81).
Measure laid on table in House, S. J. Res. 102 passed in lieu.

official_title: A resolution American Indian Religious Freedom.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insurlar Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1308) Declares that it shall be the policy of the United States to protect and preserve the traditional religions of American Indians. Requires the President to direct the Federal departments and agencies to evaluate their policies and procedures in consultation with native traditional religious leaders to determine appropriate changes necessary to protect Native American religious cultural rights and practices.

titles.title: A resolution American Indian Religious Freedom.
